name: Salmon With Creamy Cucumber-Fennel Salad

ingredientsDescription.name: fennel
ingredientsDescription.description: 1 fennel bulb, cored and thinly sliced, plus 2 tablespoons chopped fennel fronds

directions: Heat oven to 400° F. Rub the salmon with the oil and place on a rimmed baking sheet. Season with the cayenne and ¼ teaspoon each salt and black pepper. Top with the lemon slices and bake until opaque throughout, 8 to 12 minutes.
Meanwhile, whisk together the yogurt, vinegar, and 1/4 teaspoon each salt and black pepper in a large bowl. Add the fennel, fennel fronds, and cucumber and toss to coat.
Serve the salmon with the cucumber-fennel salad
